Zebpay Tic Tac Toe
Login Disclaimer Trading in cryptocurrencies is subject to market, technical, and legal risks. I have read and understood the Proceed Securely ZebPay will send a verification code by SMS to your mobile number. Carrier charges may apply.
Create one here! No account? Create one here Please select your country and enter your mobile number. Mobile number Please enter your mobile number
Please enter your mobile number without any space or special character
Please read and accept the Terms of Use & Privacy Policy to get started. Select Country
Kindly remove \'0\' prefix from your number.
Set Account PIN Mobile number verified Next you\'ll create a 4-digit pin for account security. Please do not share your PIN with anyone. ZebPay will never ask for your PIN. Keep your PIN secret! No ZebPay representative will ever ask for your PIN. Beware of fake social media accounts or email scams.

Verify OTP Enter Verification Code Verification code Verify Please enter the verification code sent to Please enter the verification code. Oops! The code you entered is invalid. Please check the SMS and try again. Call Me Didn\'t get the code?\nWhen the timer ends, tap the Call Me button and we\'ll call you.
Set Account PIN Confirm the 4 digit PIN Enter 4 digit PIN PIN does not match. Please choose a stronger PIN to secure your account.

2) Make payment via NEFT, IMPS or RTGS only. 3) Please mention the order number in payment notes or memo. 4) Upload payment reference number or payment receipt

Permanently deactivate your ZebPay account. Your balance must be below the minimum threshold. Caution: this action cannot be undone.

For your account safety, only few features are accessible for next 24 hours . Trade coins Receive coins Add new send address Change outgoing transaction Send coins
Archived Address This address will be archived and will no longer be in use. Are you sure you want to unarchive the address? Archive Unarchive
This address is already added & has been archived, so you can not add this address. Please try with new receiving address.
Log Out Are you sure you want to log out of ZebPay? You can log back in any time!
Enter OTP
Continue Allow us to Read Phone This will help us read your IMEI and ISMI number for security purposes against your trade transactions. Open Camera This will allow us to capture images of documents wherever required. This is required for KYC, trading and user profiles. Open Storage This will allow us to store images of documents wherever required. This is required for KYC, trading and user profiles. Get your device email address This will help us to auto-fetch your device\'s registered email address. This email address is required for your account verification (KYC) & sending security notifications.

Are you sure you want to permanently deactivate your ZebPay account?
This action cannot be undone. You will permanently lose the ability to trade on ZebPay or use your ZebPay wallet. We may retain your personal and transactional data for a period of time to fulfill compliance requirements, as per the terms of use.
Please confirm that you want to lock all your outgoing cryptocurrency transactions. You can enable it again anytime by undertaking OTP SMS verification To allow all outgoing cryptocurrency transactions, please enter your PIN and complete OTP SMS verification.

Aahhhh! Server is taking to much time to \nrespond. Ideally this shouldn\'t have \nhappened but again we don\'t live in a \nperfect world. Please try refreshing this page after \nsometime View earnings Congratulations!\nYou have started earning! Earn upto %1$s returns on your crypto holdings only on ZebPay. Buy. Hold. Earn. Upto %1$s returns on your crypto holdings, only on ZebPay. FAQ\'s Know More
Earn
When are earnings deposited into my account and how will they appear? Earnings would be credited in the trading wallet by 1st week of the next month. Can I trade with my crypto or is it locked to earn returns? Customers can trade with the crypto in the trading wallet, there are no restrictions on buy/sell. How is this different from lending? The major difference between these 2 features is that unlike in lending, the coins/ token in the Earn are available to trade. In the lending option they are available only on the maturity of the term they were locked for.
Coins Annual yield Lifetime earnings Lastmonth earnings Buy You don\'t have earnings.
